message: After we get back, it's a while before either of us speaks.
I don't have the energy to go upstairs, so I just lean against the wall and stare at my feet.
Mink sits at the table, puffing away at his pipe.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Do you, uh, think your guys'll be alright?"

name: ミンク
message: "It's up to them. Doesn't matter what I think."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But what if they get arrested?!"

name: ミンク
message: "If we go back to save them, then we'll all be stuck in jail."
It hurts just to speak, so I swallow, coating my dry throat with saliva.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It was my fault. If I'd done it right, then maybe..."
Mink sets his pipe on the table and strides up to me.
Suddenly, his massive hand is around my throat. He slams me into the wall, gazing down at me as I struggle with cold, expressionless eyes.

name: ミンク
message: "You never learn, do you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh... Ugh..."

name: ミンク
message: "Is feeling guilty going to change anything? Don't waste my time with your pointless bullshit."
<4line> "Take a long, hard look at reality. When did anyone blame you for what happened? You're just wallowing in your self-important garbage, trying to avoid responsibility for what happens next."

name: ミンク
message: "It's too late to run."
With a last hard shake, Mink releases my neck.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hack, hack, ugh, guh, gah...!"
I start coughing violently as soon as my airway is freed, but before I can recover, Mink grabs me by the hair.
He tugs my head back hard, so I'm looking right up at him. My nerves scream in agony.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh, guh... Nghh...!"

name: ミンク
message: "Get your shit together."

name: ミンク
message: "If you can't find the strength, I'll drag it out of you myself. It'll be easier on both of us that way."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the― Ngh, eek, ahh...!"
I feel an intense, sharp pain from my hair, the likes of which I've never felt before.
Mink has grabbed ahold of my hair and sunk his teeth into it.
The pain is so intense―like he's gnawing through raw nerves―that sweat breaks out all over my body.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aah! Ngh, ugh, guh...!"
The agony is blinding. All I can see is red.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ahh! That hurts... Let... go... Let go...!"
I want to escape the pain so badly that before I know it, I've punched Mink in the face.
The pain abruptly stops.
When I return to my senses, Mink is glaring at me sidelong.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh!"
His answering punch spins my world around.
As I stagger, Mink grabs me by the shoulders and tries to flip me around.
